content.title: National Award For Senior Citizens (vayoshreshtha Samman): Sports And Adventure
content.department: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
content.details: Every year, the Department of Social Justice and Empowerment, Government of India confers the 'National Award for Senior Citizens (Vayoshreshtha Samman)' to the eminent and outstanding senior citizens and institutions/organizations involved in rendering distinguished service for the cause of elderly persons, especially indigent senior citizens. The awards are conferred on 1st October every year by the Hon’ble President of India at Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi. The 'Vayoshreshtha Samman: Sports and Adventure' award shall be given to senior citizens who have won international acclaim and who continue to contribute in the field of sports and adventure. A total of 11 awards are given along with a Certificate, a Memento and also Cash Award. The Awards are given across 13 categories.
benefits: Boarding and lodging expenses for awardees and one companion
eligibility: Exemplary contribution in the field of Sports
Recognition of sportsmanship at State or National or International level
Outstanding achievement in the promotion and dissemination of sports to the younger generation
documents_required: Proof of Educational Qualification (Passing Certificate, Marksheet)
Details of work done in the last three years in the field
Details of Awards and Honours Received

faqs.question: What are the objectives of this scheme?
faqs.answer: The objective of this scheme is to honour the eminent and outstanding senior citizens and institutions/organizations involved in rendering distinguished service for the cause of elderly persons, especially indigent senior citizens.

faqs.question: When are these awards conferred?
faqs.answer: The awards are conferred on 1st October every year.

faqs.question: Who confers these awards?
faqs.answer: The awards are conferred by the Hon’ble President of India at Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi.

faqs.question: How many categories are there in this award?
faqs.answer: The Awards are given across 13 categories: 07 Institutional Categories and 06 categories of individual type.

faqs.question: Can I nominate myself for this award?
faqs.answer: No, Self-nominations for the Awards shall not be considered.
